definition: Wen River in northwest Sichuan (same as 汶川)/classical name of river in Shandong, used to refer to Qi 齊國|齐国
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
East Timor (officially Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste)
Wenchuan county (Tibetan: wun khron rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang autonomous prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan
Wenchuan county (Tibetan: wun khron rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang autonomous prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan
Wenshang County in Jining 濟寧|济宁[Ji3 ning2], Shandong
Wenshang County in Jining 濟寧|济宁[Ji3 ning2], Shandong/classically, upper reaches of Wen River in Shandong, used to refer to Qi 齊國|齐国[Qi2 guo2]
Leuven (a town in Belgium famous for its university)
Maowen county in Sichuan, home of the Qiang people 羗族|羌族
Dawenkou culture (c. 4100-2600 BC), Neolithic culture based in today's Shandong area 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
Brunei Darussalam, independent sultanate in northwest Borneo/also written 文萊|文莱

sentences.english: A few hundred cyclists have even braved the pot-holed roads for a "Tour de Timor" mountain-bike race.
sentences.chinese: 一場環帝汶自行車賽在凹凸不平的路上拉開帷幕。

sentences.english: I bought a drama book in the Wen Lai, the journey hammer to convey time to use.
sentences.chinese: 我在汶淶買了個戲本子，路途打發時間用。

sentences.english: The top view, Taylor's plain, Wen River flow, take in everything in a glance.
sentences.chinese: 山頂遠望，泰萊平原，汶河西流，一覽無餘。

definition: long or drawn out/remote in time or space/leisurely/to swing/pensive/worried
edge of a tortoiseshell/see 冉冉[ran3 ran3]
